title: Exploring Tortuga Liquid Staking
description: Learn about Tortuga, the first liquid staking protocol on Aptos that allows you to stake your APT while maintaining liquidity through stAPT tokens that you can use across DeFi.

tasks.title: Prepare for Staking
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Tortuga

tasks.title: Liquid Staking Basics
tasks.description: Understand what liquid staking is and its benefits
tasks.question: What is liquid staking?
options: A way to earn interest by providing liquidity to DEXes
A staking model where rewards are paid in stablecoins
A mechanism to stake tokens while receiving a liquid token that represents your stake
A method to liquidate staked positions instantly without waiting
tasks.correctAnswer: A mechanism to stake tokens while receiving a liquid token that represents your stake

tasks.title: Tortuga stAPT Token
tasks.question: What does the stAPT token represent?
options: A stablecoin pegged to APT
A governance token for Tortuga protocol
Your staked APT position plus accumulated rewards
A derivative that tracks Aptos price movements
tasks.correctAnswer: Your staked APT position plus accumulated rewards

tasks.title: Staking Mechanism
tasks.description: Understand how staking works on Tortuga
tasks.question: How does Tortuga stake APT tokens?
options: Through a centralized service
Via smart contracts that delegate to validators
By running their own validators only
Through a bridge to other networks
tasks.correctAnswer: Via smart contracts that delegate to validators

tasks.title: stAPT Utility
tasks.description: Learn how stAPT can be used in the Aptos ecosystem
tasks.question: What can you do with stAPT tokens while your APT is staked?
options: Nothing until you withdraw
Only transfer them to other wallets
Use them in DeFi protocols for lending, liquidity, or additional yield
Only view your staking balance
tasks.correctAnswer: Use them in DeFi protocols for lending, liquidity, or additional yield

tasks.title: Unstaking Process
tasks.description: Understanding how to unstake on Tortuga
tasks.question: What happens when you unstake APT on Tortuga?
options: You receive APT instantly
Your stAPT is burned and you enter an unstaking period
You need to find someone willing to buy your stAPT
You are penalized with a fee
tasks.correctAnswer: Your stAPT is burned and you enter an unstaking period

tasks.title: Security Model
tasks.question: How does Tortuga protect staked assets?
options: Through centralized custody
Using Move's resource model and formal verification
By insuring all staked APT
With a multi-signature wallet
tasks.correctAnswer: Using Move's resource model and formal verification

tasks.title: Yield Management
tasks.question: How are staking rewards reflected in Tortuga?
options: Direct APT payments to your wallet
Increase in stAPT tokens in your wallet
Increase in the redemption value of stAPT
Through a separate reward token
tasks.correctAnswer: Increase in the redemption value of stAPT
